import '../Apartment/index.css' import logements from '../../data/logement.json' import Slider from '../../components/Slider' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function Apartment({title, location, rating, host, equipments, description, pictures}){ const { id } = useParams(); const logement = logements.find((logement) => logement.id === id ); // console.log(logement.title) return (
{/* */}

{logement.title}

{logement.location}

{logement.tags}

{logement.host.name }

{logement.rating}

{logement.description}

{logement.equipments}

); } export default Apartment
